title: Assessing government training needs for the future of digital service delivery
description: As the Government of Canada (GC) works to improve how it designs and delivers services, we can look to use new tools, methods and practices to help us build our capacity to get there. But people — public servants — remain at the centre of these efforts. So, when we teamed up with the Faculty of Management at Dalhousie University to better understand and assess the current training needs for digital disciplines across the GC, we started by talking to public servants.
